name: Gravimancy Manor
description:
Explore the Mysterious Mansion owned by an even more mysterious (as in, does not appear in this build) gravity mage. Push boxes onto switches in order to navigate your way through, but don't get tripped up by the wild directions the boxes fly!

------------------------------------

This game was made for the ACM Game Dev Club's Fall 2022 "Gravity" Game Jam. It contains 5 levels, custom art, and royalty-free music. It even has controller support!
